Primary Contact: Dave McElroy, President; Phone: 778.215.4114; Email: president@kelownaflyingclub.com
Service Details: - Promotes civil aviation in the Kelowna and district area through education, awareness, advocacy and fellowship activities- Self-sustaining, member-driven organization offers preferred pricing for events and merchandise, priority of access for ticket sales, access to book and video lending library, participation in the tool-lending program, and access to the Members' Only area- Hosts events such as BBQs for visiting aviators, including the Buffalo Air 'Ice Pilots, annual COPA for Kids Jr. Aviation Event, fly-ins, education sessions, presentations, and socials- Provides ease of access to the general aviation and itinerant parking for members and visiting pilots
Meetings: - First Tue each month, 7:00pm (Feb-Dec)- Pre-meeting BBQs, 6:00pm (beginning in Apr)
